Empath::

Surprisingly, Empath puts on the brakes.  Turning, she transforms to 
robot mode and hovers some distance away.  <Cygnar,> she transmits, 
<I suggest you save your confrontation for another time.  I know when 
I'm overmatched - if you have any brains, you can see that you are, 
too.  If you want any chance of stopping Hydras, you'd best come with 
me.>

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> OOC: Finally, I was wondering when they'd come back to reality.
> 
> ::Cygnar::
>        He looks warily at the newly formed Hydras.  He slowly comes 
out into 
> the open to stand in front of Hydras.  He looks up at him and 
stares.  "No.  
> You ask us to give up our weapons and join forces with our so 
called enemy.  
> I say NO!  I cannot and will not allow you to dissolve your own 
army.  Even 
> if it costs me my life.  I WILL NOT SUBMIT!!!"  He backs up a few 
steps.  
> "WHO IS WITH ME?  WHO HERE BELIEVES IN WHAT THEY WERE FIGHTING 
FOR?  WHO HERE 
> HAS THE COURAGE TO SAY NO?"  He backs up a few more steps and 
braces himself.
